Your health and well-being is our priority

TheFogMen is a client-centered business and because of this, our clients' health and well-being is our topmost priority. We strive to perform our services to the best of our abilities, and to build long-term relationships with all our clients.

Find Out More

We've got what you need!

- For General Health -

This "white stuff" is a stabilized and long-acting disinfectant against viruses, bacteria and fungus. Protect you and your loved ones against vector-borne diseases such as dengue, yellow fever, malaria, shigellosis and transmitted diseases such as hand-foot-mouth disease, influenza, rotavirus, scabies and others.

- Broad Spectrum Insecticide -

Eliminate insect pests such as mosquitos, cockroaches, ants, flies, bed bugs, mites, fleas and many more. Lasting effects of up to 30 days indoors (residual) and 7 days outdoors with residual effects that continue to kill the insects upon contact. Residual tested is safe for human consumption and does not pose harm to the environment.

- Non-Toxic Botanical Extracts Are Safe For Humans and Animals -

Again, this "white stuff" comprises botanical extracts (ETOFENPROX) and purified water. It is alcohol-free and disseminated only with water (non-diesel based). ETOFENPROX (C25H28O3) has been highly evaluated by WHO to be unlikely hazardous under normal use and is non-toxic to human and animals.
